Translations.Text: alla, nanu punarut'thana dinada ane hakuttene
alla, nanu dusisuva cittada ane hakuttene
manusyanenu, avana elubugalannu navu (matte) sanghatisalarevendu bhavisiddaneye
yakilla? Navantu avana berala tudigalannu matte racisalu samartharagiddeve
nijavagi, manusyanu tanna papakrtyagalalle munduvariya bayasuttane
‘‘punarut'thana dinavu adendu banditu?’’ Endu avanu (vyangyavagi) prasnisuttane
kannugalu koraisuvaga
candrakke grahanavadaga
mattu surya hagu candrarannu ondu gudisaladaga
a dina manusyanu ‘‘palayanakke dari ellide?’’ Endu keluvanu
Khandita illa, ellu asrayavilla
andu asrayaviruvudu nim'modeyana baliyalli matra
andu avanu manusyanige tilisuvanu, atanu munde kalisidda mattu hinde bittu bandidda karmagala kuritu
nijavagi manusyanu tanna kuritu tane saksiyagiddane
avanu adeste nepagalannoddidaru sariye
(dutare,) nivu idakkagi (divyavaniyannu nenapittukollalikkagi) aturavagi nim'ma naligeyannu calisabedi
idannu sangrahisuva hagu odisuva hone khandita nam'ma melide
addarinda navu idannu oduvaga, nivu idara pathanavannu anusarisiri
a balika idannu vivarisuva honeyu nam'ma melide
hagenu alla. (Janare,) nivu turtagi siguvudannu (iha lokavannu) matra pritisuttiri
mattu anantaraddannu (paralokavannu) bittu biduttiri
andu halavu mukhagalu araliruvavu
avu tam'ma odeyanedege noduttiruvavu
matte kelavu mukhagalu andu badiruvavu
tam'ma jote sonta muriyuvantaha vyavahara nadeyuvudannnu avu niriksisuttiruvavu
hagalla. Jivavu koralannu talupidaga
janaru, ‘‘mantrikanelliddane?’’ Ennuvaru
adu (tanna) vidayada samaya endu (sayuttiruvavanige) anisuvudu
(sattavana) mona kalugalannu serisi kattalaguvudu
andu ninu ninna odeyanedege horada bekaguvudu
